data.text: Fast. {Other/rapidshare_arrow} When an enemy ship deals damage to you while engaged in a dog-fight: Retaliate. This maneuver allows a pilot to take a quick action while engaged in a dogfight after being the target of an attack.

Fast. 

{Other/rapidshare_arrow} When an enemy ship moves to your location and does not engage, attack that fighter as a free action.
<size=8>
This maneuver allows a pilot to take a quick action while engaged in a dogfight after being the target of an attack.</size>

Fast.

Dump any amount of cargo into your location space.

<size=4>This system is most often used by smugglers, though such designs were originally built for large freighters hauling explosive materials that might become unstable...</size>

Max 1 committed per skill test.
If this test is successful, draw 1 card.

If this test is successful, draw 1 card.

Max 1 committed per skill test.
If this test is successful, draw 1 card.
<size=8>

“Don’t everybody thank me at once.”
-Han Solo</size>

Until the end of the round, you may reroute laser to shields, but are unable to attack.

<size=4>This attack pattern is typically used to approach capital ships or other vessels that have heavy firepower. It emphasizes the role of shields over firepower.</size>

Until the end of the round, you may double your shields by redistributing between front and read deflectors.

<size=4>This attack pattern focuses deflector shields in a particular direction, making it easier to absorb incoming attacks coming from a certain angle.</size>
{Weapons/bottom-right-3d-arrow} Fight. You get +1 {Other/target_laser} for this attack. This attack deals +2 damage.
{Weapons/bottom-right-3d-arrow} Fight. You get +2 {Other/target_laser} for this attack. This attack deals +1 damage.
{Weapons/bottom-right-3d-arrow} Fight. You get +2 {Other/target_laser} for this attack. This attack deals +1 damage. If you succeed by 2 or more, this attack deals +2 damage.
Uses (4 charges). {Weapons/bottom-right-3d-arrow} Spend 1 charge: Fight.This attack uses {Abstract/rss_(1)} instead of {Other/target_laser} and deals 5 damage.

Uses (0 Time) If Hyperdrive has no time left, (➔R0). {Weapons/bottom-right-3d-arrow} Resign. "Let's get out of here!" You activate the hyperdrive. Add 2 + X tokens to hyperdrive where X is your hyperdrive class. Forced: At the end of the upkeep phase, remove a supply.

Uses (0 Time) If Hyperdrive has no time left, (➔R0). {Weapons/bottom-right-3d-arrow} Resign. "Let's get out of here!" You activate the hyperdrive. Add 2 + X tokens to hyperdrive where X is your hyperdrive class. Forced: At the end of the upkeep phase, remove a supply.

Uses (0 Time) If Hyperdrive has no time left, (➔R0). {Weapons/bottom-right-3d-arrow} Resign. "Let's get out of here!" You activate the hyperdrive. Add 2 + X tokens to hyperdrive where X is your hyperdrive class. Forced: At the end of the upkeep phase, remove a supply.

{Other/rapidshare_arrow} When you play Fire-Linked weapons, attach to 2 weapon systems. 

{Other/rapidshare_arrow} When you perform a Fight action with an attached weapon system, resolve the an action on the other, paying all costs except the action (Once per round).
